data.name: Magissy
data.detailed_description:
Become a fearless adventurer and an unsurpassed heartbreaker in this open-world story-driven adult RPG.
Reveal yourself the mysteries and great dangerous adventures of the world known as Lyrn that had fallen in the conflict between two mighty sides, the Order and the Destruction, who want to find the greatest artifact of all times, the Source of Life.
Be the one whose hands ought to decide fates, whose words charm to unconsciousness, whose passion burn one's heart to the core, and be the only who worth to find out the secret of the Source and the form of true love.

Lyrn, the world of mighty forces and undiscovered mysteries, mired in the war between those who seek the Source of Life, also known as the artifact of unlimited power, the relic which allows controlling everything imaginable. Under the pressure of war, many of Lyrn inhabitants have to do everything for living, including the most filth business like working for bandits, prostitution, witchcraft, deception, and many other things.
And that is only on one hand when on the another every here and then the many dangerous things await like goblins, wild wolves, unstable magic sources and many that aren't discovered yet.

About the game:
Explore the immense and dangerous lands of Lyrn starting with the floating island Alba, where the dark roots of the story taking it's begin. Find your way of a hero through troubles and distresses of another's one and be rewarded handsomely with a punch of gold or with the heat of love in very different ways. The punishment decision about defeated one with sword or word is only up to you, should they feed worms with their bodies or appease the thirst of the lust of yours.

The game has two modes available to play, "STORY" and "HAREM"
In "STORY" mode you explore the story of the world Lyrn, do the quests, making acquaintances with beautiful girls.
In "HAREM" mode you can play all the adult scenes with all the girls you have unlocked in the storyline.

- RPG-system which allows playing with your preferable style
- Male and female playable character
- Huge and colorful 3d-action world
- Many unique fully-voiced adult scenes
- Original storyline inspired by most iconic RPGs
- Interactable female NPCs, fully-voiced by professional actresses
- Advanced fighting system
- Crafting system

data.short_description: Magissy is an Open-World Story-Driven Adult RPG where you take place as a charismatic adventurer and excellent lover, who fears not the danger of dark corners of the Lyrn nor the darkest fantasies of it's behaviors.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: IntelCore I5-4690K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final

content_descriptors.notes: This game is an adult game and includes strong language, frequent nudity and strong sexual content.
